abstract: Fabián Ariel Orellana Valenzuela (born 27 January 1986) is a Chilean professional footballer who plays for Celta de Vigo in La Liga, as a winger.
comment: Fabián Ariel Orellana Valenzuela (born 27 January 1986) is a Chilean professional footballer who plays for Celta de Vigo in La Liga, as a winger.
